nodes.text: A Fleet Commander was a position given to an officer of the New Republic Defense Fleet. One notable fleet commander during the Galactic Civil War was Hellip who took over local operations, following General Hera Syndulla's battle with the loyalist forces of the 204th Imperial Fighter Wing, after they attacked the Imperial planet Chadawa as part of a second Operation: Cinder.
The military title of fleet commander was first mentioned in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
